document_data.caption: A map showing Phaulkonmere Villa (labeled #17) on Snake Alley.
document_data.name: Phaulkonmere Villa
document_data.mainbody: '''Phaulkonmere Villa''' was the home of the [[Phaulkon]] noble family located in [[Waterdeep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The villa was composed of four buildings, each standing two or three stories tall.
document_data.Location: Phaulkonmere Villa was located in the central section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Southern Ward|Southern Ward]] within the [[Waterdeep/Adventurers' Quarter|Adventurers' Quarter]]. The villa sat in the south section of the Adventurers' Quarter on [[Snake Alley]] facing [[Kerrigan's Court]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Adventurers' Quarter}}
